word:
Letter 60a, 1896
     709. The proper cooking of foods is a most important accomplishment. Especially where meat is not made a principal article of food is good cooking an essential requirement. Something must be prepared to take the place of meat, and these substitutes for meat must be well prepared, so that meat will not be desired. 
     [MAKE CHANGES UNDERSTANDINGLY--320, 380] 
     [ADEQUATE DIET NEEDED WHEN LEAVING OFF MEAT--320] 
     [GOD WILL GIVE SKILL IN PREPARING HEALTH FOODS TO TAKE THE PLACE OF FLESH MEATS--376, 400, 401, 404] 
     [DIET OF FRUITS, GRAINS, NUTS, AND VEGETABLES TO REPLACE MEAT --472, 483, 484, 513]
